channel.title: My run-server dnt work!
channel.description: THankyou guys,, ive found a good complier, now one more prob... i cnt run the server! GA. thers 2 run options, they both dnt work...

item.title: My run-server dnt work!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Actually no:

“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/javac.exe” *.java
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m server

First line is compile see the JDK
Second line, wtf why you using JDK (compile) to run server.

See I was right so GTFO!

Read full topic

item.title: My run-server dnt work!
item.dc:creator: @paintball10 paintball10
item.description:
@paintball10 wrote:

in your “CLASS” and “CLASSPATH” change jdk to jre,thats what i had to do now ever run server and compiler works for me

Read full topic

item.title: My run-server dnt work!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

@echo off
title Figmentscape runserver
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/javac.exe” *.java
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m server
pause

At bryanc no need to be so harsh… hes just trying to help me… and u were wrong that is what it said when i was trying to run… u dnt no what i clicked… i do…

item.title: My run-server dnt work!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“xx pk3r xx, post:2, topic:218110”]lol if ur using vista then i know wat to do if not the ur on ur own

if its vista get winrar and right click on the runserver and click add to archive ull get a compressed folder and double click on the compressed and click the runserver in there and there u go it shuld work…[/quote]

Please be quiet. You have no idea what your talking about.
Vista is no different than XP when running a server so everyone who says that is obviously retarded.

@johno2

Right click the run.bat and edit, tell us what it says inside.
Btw if it cannot find the path specified thats for it compiling not running.

Read full topic
